derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin foliaceus 'leafy' (from folium 'leaf') + -ous

means.word_mean: 1. of or pertaining to or resembling the leaf of a plant
3. (especially of metamorphic rock) having thin leaflike layers or strata
